column3: Offence
column4: Punishment

column3: Murder
column4: Death, or imprisonment for life, and fine.

column3: Murder by a person under sentence of imprisonment for life.
column4: Death

column3: Culpable homicide not amounting to murder, if act by which the death is caused is done with intention of causing death, etc.
column4: Imprisonment for life, or imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: If act is done with knowledge that it is likely to cause death, but without any intention to cause death, etc.
column4: Imprisonment for 10 years, or fine, or both.

column3: Causing death by rash or negligence act.
column4: Imprisonment for 2 years or fine, or both.

column3: Dowry death
column4: Imprisonment of not less than seven years but which may extend to imprisonment for life.

column3: Abetment of suicide committed by child, or insane or delirious person or an idiot, or a person intoxicated.
column4: Death, or imprisonment for life, or imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Abetting the commission of suicide
column4: Imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Attempt to murder
column4: Imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: If such act causes hurt to any person.
column4: Imprisonment for life, or imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Attempt by life-convict to murder, if hurt is caused.
column4: Death or imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Attempt to commit culpable homicide.
column4: Imprisonment for 3 years, or fine, or both.

column3: If such act causes hurt to any person.
column4: Imprisonment for 7 years, or fine, or both.

column3: Attempt to commit suicide
column4: Simple imprisonment for 1 year, or fine, or both.

column3: Being a thug
column4: Imprisonment for life and fine.

column3: Causing miscarriage
column4: Imprisonment for 3 years, fine, or both.

column3: If the woman be quick with child
column4: Imprisonment for 7 years and fine.

column3: Causing miscarriage without woman's consent.
column4: Imprisonment for life, or imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Death caused by an act done with intent to cause miscarriage.
column4: Imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: If act done without woman's consent.
column4: Imprisonment for life, or as above.

column3: Act done with intent to prevent a child being born alive, or to cause it to die after its birth.
column4: Imprisonment for 10 years or fine, or both.

column3: Causing death of a quick unborn child by an act amounting to culpable homicide.
column4: Imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Exposure of a child under 12 years of age by parent or person having care of it with intention of wholly abandoning it.
column4: Imprisonment for 7 years, or fine, or both.

column3: Concealment of birth by secret disposal of dead body.
column4: Imprisonment for 2 years, or fine, or both.

column3: Voluntarily causing hurt
column4: Imprisonment for 1 year, or fine of 1,000 rupees, or both.

column3: Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons or means.
column4: Imprisonment for 3 years, or fine, or both.

column3: Voluntarily causing grievous hurt
column4: Imprisonment for 7 years and fine.

column3: Voluntarily causing grievous hurt by dangerous weapons or means.
column4: Imprisonment for life, or imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Voluntarily causing hurt to extort property or a valuable security, or to constrain to do anything which is illegal or which may facilitate the commission of an offence.
column4: Imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Administering stupefying drug with intent to cause hurt, etc.
column4: Ditto.

column3: Voluntarily causing grievous hurt to export property or a valuable security, or to constrain to do anything which is illegal, or which may facilitate the commission of an offence.
column4: Imprisonment for life, or imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Voluntarily causing hurt to extort confession or information, or to compel restoration of property, etc.
column4: Imprisonment for 7 years and fine.

column3: Voluntarily causing grievous hurt to extort confession or information, or to compel restoration of property, etc.
column4: Imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Voluntarily causing hurt to deter public servant from his duty.
column4: Imprisonment for 3 years, or fine, or both.

column3: Voluntarily causing grievous hurt to deter public servant from his duty.
column4: Imprisonment for 10 years and fine.

column3: Voluntarily causing hurt on grave and sudden provocation, not intending to hurt any other than the person who gave the provocation.
column4: Imprisonment for 1 month, or fine of 500 rupees, or both.

column3: Causing grievous hurt on grave and sudden provocation, not intending to hurt any other than the person who gave the provocation.
column4: Imprisonment for 4 years, or fine of 2,000 rupees, or both.

column3: Doing any act which endangers human life or the personal safety of others.
column4: Imprisonment for 3 months, or fine of 250 rupees, or both.

column3: Causing hurt by an act which endangers human life, etc.
column4: Imprisonment for 6 months, or fine of 500 rupees, or both.

column3: Causing grievous hurt by an act which endangers human life, etc.
column4: Imprisonment for 2 years, or fine of 1,000 rupees, or both.

column3: Wrongfully restraining any person
column4: Simple imprisonment for 1 month, or fine of 500 rupees, or both.

column3: Wrongfully confining any person
column4: Imprisonment for 1 year, fine of 1,000 rupees, or both.

column3: Wrongfully confining for 3 or more days.
column4: Imprisonment for 2 years, or fine, or both.

column3: Wrongfully confining for 10 or and more days.
column4: Imprisonment for 3 years and fine.

column3: Keeping any person in wrongful confinement, knowing that a writ has been issued for his liberation.
column4: Imprisonment for 2 years, in addition to imprisonment under any other section.

column3: Wrongful confinement in secret
column4: Ditto

column3: Wrongful confinement for the purpose of extorting property, or constraining to an illegal act, etc.
column4: Imprisonment for 3 years and fine.

column3: Wrongful confinement for the purpose of extorting confession or information, or of compelling restoration of property, etc.
column4: Ditto
